titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: Arrival At Hospital Time (Retired) - Description

p.b: Arrival At Hospital Time has been retired from the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.
The last live version of Arrival At Hospital Time is available in the March 2012 release of the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.
Access to this version can be obtained by emailing information.standards@nhs.net with "NHS Data Model and Dictionary - Archive Request" in the email subject line.
